name: Psyduck
flavorText:
While lulling its
enemies with its
vacant look, this wily POKéMON will
use psychokinetic
powers.

previous.name: Persian
previous.flavorText:
Although its fur
has many admirers,
it is tough to raise as a pet
because of its
fickle meanness.

next.name: Golduck
next.flavorText:
Often seen swim­
ming elegantly by
lake shores. It is often mistaken
for the Japanese
monster, Kappa.
